name: Tackle
description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target.

name: Ember
secondaryEffect: May inflict a burn on the target.
description: A basic fire attack that may also leave the target with a burn.

name: Water Gun
description: A basic water attack that shoots water at the target.

name: Vine Whip
description: A physical attack in which the user strikes the target with vines.

name: Scratch
description: A physical attack in which the user scratches the target with sharp claws.
